attributes.additional_details: it is not fair to punish dogs for what they have been trained by humans to do
attributes.background: clamp down on backyard breeders and those who get dogs and mistreat or train the dog to attack. stop banning breeds and start making people accountable for what they do

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions: 

https://moderate.petition.parliament.uk/admin/petitions/643650
Bring back a Dog Licence

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643033
Require anyone who breeds dogs to have a licence

It is already an offence if a person's dog is dangerously out of control, and it is an aggravated offence if the dog that is out of control injures a person.
